Course Overview

Develop practical AI and digital skills to accelerate transformation.

This masterclass equips participants with hands-on experience in AI tools, automation, data analytics, human-centred design, and ethical decision-making. Learn to implement solutions that drive measurable business impact.

What You Need

A computer with internet access, basic digital literacy, and familiarity with office productivity tools.

Learning Outcomes

Participants will be able to apply AI tools, automate workflows, analyse data for strategic decisions, and implement human-centred digital solutions responsibly and effectively.
